content.raw:
Hi Carlos,

I’m planning on re-writing this in the acoustic-pinger branch using the feedback that I have received from Brian and yourself.  I expect that means a fresh request would be required when the rewrite is finished. 

Would declining this pull request also delete the comments?

Regards,

Jonathan.
